alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 3:01AM PDT until March 13 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected in the Owens Valley. Gusts to 65 mph in the Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on sections of Highway 395. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
